com.alibaba.mtc

Class MtContextTimerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimerTask
      • com.alibaba.mtc.MtContextTimerTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Deprecated. 
    Use MtContextRunnable, ScheduledExecutorService instead of Timer, TimerTask.

    @Deprecated
public final class MtContextTimerTask
extends TimerTask
    MtContextTimerTask decorate TimerTask, so as to get MtContextThreadLocal and transmit it to the time of MtContextTimerTask execution, needed when use MtContextTimerTask to TimerTask.

    Use factory method get(TimerTask) to create instance.

    NOTE: The MtContextTimerTask make the the method TimerTask.scheduledExecutionTime() in the origin TimerTask lose effectiveness!

    Since:
    0.9.1
    Author:
    Jerry Lee (oldratlee at gmail dot com)
    See Also:
    Timer, TimerTask

      • get

        public static MtContextTimerTask get(TimerTask timerTask,
                     boolean releaseMtContextAfterRun)
        Deprecated. 
        Factory method, wrapper input Runnable to MtContextTimerTask.

        This method is idempotent.

        Parameters:
        timerTask - input TimerTask
        releaseMtContextAfterRun - release MtContext after run, avoid memory leak even if MtContextRunnable is referred.
        Returns:
        Wrapped TimerTask

      • get

        public static MtContextTimerTask get(TimerTask timerTask,
                     boolean releaseMtContextAfterRun,
                     boolean idempotent)
        Deprecated. 
        Factory method, wrapper input Runnable to MtContextTimerTask.

        This method is idempotent.

        Parameters:
        timerTask - input TimerTask
        releaseMtContextAfterRun - release MtContext after run, avoid memory leak even if MtContextRunnable is referred.
        idempotent - is idempotent or not. true will cover up bugs! DO NOT set, only when you know why.
        Returns:
        Wrapped TimerTask
